name: Beef Fillet
description: Clean steak without fat. Serving recommendation: 1 kg is suitable for 3-4 diners.

name: Burger
description: A hamburger made from a combination of beef shoulder, asado, and 20% fat for a perfect culinary experience. The meat from which the hamburger is made up is of particularly fine quality and is ground daily. You can choose another combination of beef/mutto...

name: Whole Chicken
description: A whole chicken without feathers, please indicate whether to divide it or leave it whole.

name: Chicken Breast
description: Main part of the chicken, makes up the bulk of the mass of the whole chicken. A large, bright and low-fat piece. Easy to process, can be cut into slices, cubes, strips and even made whole. Mainly used for frying and saut√©ing.

name: Chicken Legs
description: Chicken drumsticks - also known as 'poolke'. Very juicy meat, and not too fatty. Suitable for short/long cooking.

name: Chicken skewers
description: Selected pieces skewered about a kilogram in a case of about 8 pieces.

name: Entrecote
description: Premium entrecote. Fresh and high quality. Carefully selected sliced meat.
